Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.effects.build

Class StandardBuild

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.effects.build.StandardBuild
Direct Known Subclasses:
BuildBeforeMove, NotOnPerimeter, NotOnSamePosition, OnSamePositionBlockOnly, UnderMyself
public class StandardBuild
extends java.lang.Object
This class defines the general rules of building. Builds defines the number of buildings the player can make during his turn.

  • Method Details

    • build

      public java.util.Set<Position> build​(Position workerPosition, Board board, Turn turn)
      The general build method
      Parameters:
      workerPosition - the worker's Position
      board - the board
      turn - the player's turn
      Returns:
      a Set<Cell> collect that only has the cells where the player can build in

    • checkBuildConditions

      protected boolean checkBuildConditions​(Cell workerCell, Turn turn)
      Determines whether the chosen worker can (or still can) build this turn.
      Parameters:
      workerCell - the worker's Cell
      turn - the player's turn
      Returns:
      returns true only and only if the worker considered: is a worker of the current player, has already moved and has not already built "builds" times this turn.
